title: purchase-history-options.response
description: Response for retrieving vendor purchase history import options

errorCode.description: Error code returned from the vendor's API, if any

callBackInfo.description: Optional callback information to be used in the next request. Only present if a callback is needed

options.description: List of available purchase history import options

shouldCallback.description: Controls whether another request should be made

values.description:
Generic object to be passed to the next request
Used for passing data between chained requests

VendorPurchaseHistoryOptionDto.description: Object to represent a type of purchase history option on a supplier's API

id.description: Identifier for the purchase history option to be used in purchase history request

name.description: Display name of the purchase history option i.e. template, recent history, etc.

subOptions.description: List of values for the purchase history option i.e. templates

id.description:
Identifier for the sub option to be used in purchase history request in Values Collection. Presented to user in a dropdown
e.g. templatId, dateRange, etc.

values.description:
The available values to select for the sub option
e.g. templateId, dateRange, etc.
